description:
Shoulder-season rides shouldn't include cold feet. Slip on these wind- and water-resistant covers to keep your feet warm as the weather turns.

  • High-stretch fabric with a DWR-finish sheds wind and light rain
  • Fleece insulation backer
  • Neoprene cuff seals out drafts
  • Bottom openings for cleats and heels
  • Designed for use from 4 to 14°C
name: Castelli Entrata Shoecovers - Unisex
